The '''iPad''' is an unreleased [[tablet computer]] product announced by [[Steve Jobs]] of [[Apple Inc.]] on the 27 January 2010 at the Yerba Buena centre in [[San Francisco]], [[California]]. The device is a touchscreen tablet-form computer that runs the [[iPhone]] "touch" OS, as well as software designed for the iPhone and specifically for the iPad, delivered through Apple's iTunes-based App Store.
